languages.text: Не каждый слуга Омниссии твердо следует катехизису эксплуатации и обслуживания. Малатеки — расстриги и изгои, влекомые неодобряемым знанием, скитаются по Простору и балансируют на грани схизмы. Они будут благодарны покровителю, даровавшему им приют, безопасность и ресурсы для изысканий. Миссия Касбаллики имеет связи среди малатеков и может тайно собрать на Янусе целый ковен нечестивых мудрецов, дабы те могли бестрепетно изучать загадочные артефакты ксеносов, во множестве находимые на этом мире.

traits.locale_text: Развернуть тайную лабораторию, в которой грамотеи и малатеки, доставленные Касбалликой, будут экспериментировать над ксеносскими артефактами без присмотра Адептус Механикус.

languages.text: Not all servants of the Omnissiah firmly adhere to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation. The malateks are defrocked clergy and other similar outcasts who wander the Koronus Expanse in pursuit of undesirable knowledge, teetering on the brink of a schism. A protector who gives them shelter, safety, and resources for their research will earn their gratitude. The Kasballica Mission has connections among the malateks and can secretly assemble an entire coven of the unholy sages on Janus so they may intrepidly study the mysterious xenos artefacts found in abundance on this world.
languages.original_text: Не каждый слуга Омниссии твердо следует катехизису эксплуатации и обслуживания. Малатеки — расстриги и изгои, влекомые неодобряемым знанием, скитаются по Простору и балансируют на грани схизмы. Они будут благодарны покровителю, даровавшему им приют, безопасность и ресурсы для изысканий. Миссия Касбаллики имеет связи среди малатеков и может тайно собрать на Янусе целый ковен нечестивых мудрецов, дабы те могли бестрепетно изучать загадочные артефакты ксеносов, во множестве находимые на этом мире.

traits.locale_text: Not all servants of the Omnissiah firmly adhere to the Catechism of Operation and Maintenance. The Malateks are defrocked clergy and other outcasts who wander the Koronus in pursuit of undesirable knowledge, teetering on the brink of schism. A protector who gives them shelter, safety, and resources for their research will earn their gratitude. The Kasballica Mission has connections among the Malateks and can secretly assemble an entire coven of the unholy sages on Janus so they may intrepidly study the mysterious xenos artifacts found in abundance on this world.

languages.text: No todos los sirvientes del Omnissiah se atienen al Catequismo de Operación y Mantenimiento. Los malateks son clero expulsado y otros proscritos que recorren la Extensión de Koronus en busca de saber prohibido, al borde del cisma. Cualquier protector que les ofrezca refugio, amparo y recursos se ganará su gratitud. La misión Kasballica tiene contactos entre los malateks y puede reunir un cónclave secreto de estos impíos sabios en Janus para que estudien los artefactos xenos que abundan en el planeta.
languages.original_text: Not all servants of the Omnissiah firmly adhere to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation. The malateks are defrocked clergy and other similar outcasts who wander the Koronus Expanse in pursuit of undesirable knowledge, teetering on the brink of a schism. The Kasballica Mission has connections among the malateks and can secretly assemble an entire coven of the unholy sages on Janus so they may intrepidly study the mysterious xenos artefacts found in abundance on this world.

languages.text: Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie n'adhèrent pas tous aveuglément au Catéchisme des Opérations et de la Maintenance. Les malateks, un regroupement de membres du clergé défroqués et d'autres parias, arpentent les Étendues de Koronus en quête de savoirs iconoclastes. Pour certains, leur existence s'apparente dangereusement à un schisme religieux. Tout protecteur leur offrant refuge, sécurité et ressources pour mener à bien leurs recherches sera assuré de leur reconnaissance. La Mission de la Kasballica, qui possède des contacts au sein des malateks, est en mesure de rassembler en secret une congrégation complète de ces intrépides sages de l'occulte sur Janus, afin d'étudier les mystérieux artefacts xénos qui s'y trouvent en abondance.
languages.original_text: Not all servants of the Omnissiah firmly adhere to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation. The malateks are defrocked clergy and other similar outcasts who wander the Koronus Expanse in pursuit of undesirable knowledge, teetering on the brink of a schism. A protector who gives them shelter, safety, and resources for their research will earn their gratitude. The Kasballica Mission has connections among the malateks and can secretly assemble an entire coven of the unholy sages on Janus so they may intrepidly study the mysterious xenos artefacts found in abundance on this world.

languages.text: 并非所有欧姆尼塞亚的仆人都会坚定地遵守操作与维护原理。“黑暗贤者”这个词，泛指那些被逐出机械神教的神职人员与类似的被放逐者。他们在科罗努斯扩区终日徘徊，追寻着禁忌的知识，在异端的边缘摇摇欲坠。如果有人能为他们提供庇护、安全与资源，则会赢得他们的感激。卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团就与这些黑暗贤者勾结在了一起，他们在加努斯秘密召集黑暗贤者的密会，为他们提供形形色色的神秘异形造物，让这些人尽情研究。
languages.original_text: Not all servants of the Omnissiah firmly adhere to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation. The malateks are defrocked clergy and other similar outcasts who wander the Koronus Expanse in pursuit of undesirable knowledge, teetering on the brink of a schism. A protector who gives them shelter, safety, and resources for their research will earn their gratitude. The Kasballica Mission has connections among the malateks and can secretly assemble an entire coven of the unholy sages on Janus so they may intrepidly study the mysterious xenos artefacts found in abundance on this world.

languages.text: 万機神に仕えるすべての者が「操業と整備のカテキズム」を堅く遵守しているわけではない。マラテックは、職位を剥奪された聖職者や、その他類似の追放者であり、求むるべきではない知識を求めてコロヌス・エクスパンスを放浪し、分裂の瀬戸際に瀕している。彼らに避難所や安全、研究のための資源を与える保護者は、彼らから感謝されることになるだろう。カスバリカ聖務団はマラテックとの繋がりがあり、ヤヌスにいる不浄なる賢人たちの盟約団を密かに集め、この世界に数多存在する謎めいたゼノの遺物を積極的に研究させている。
languages.original_text: Not all servants of the Omnissiah firmly adhere to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation. The malateks are defrocked clergy and other similar outcasts who wander the Koronus Expanse in pursuit of undesirable knowledge, teetering on the brink of a schism. A protector who gives them shelter, safety, and resources for their research will earn their gratitude. The Kasballica Mission has connections among the malateks and can secretly assemble an entire coven of the unholy sages on Janus so they may intrepidly study the mysterious xenos artefacts found in abundance on this world.

traits.locale_text: 万機神に仕えるすべての者が「操業と整備のカテキズム」を堅く遵守しているわけではない。マラテックは、職位を剥奪された聖職者や、その他類似の追放者であり、求むるべきではない知識を求めてコロヌス・エクスパンスを放浪し、分裂の瀬戸際に瀕している。彼らに避難所や安全、研究のための資源を与える保護者は、彼らから感謝されることになるだろう。カスバリカ聖務団はマラテックとの繋がりがあり、ヤヌスにいる不浄なる賢人たちの盟約団を密かに集め、この世界に数多存在する謎めいたゼノの遺物を積極的に研究させている。

languages.text: Nicht alle Diener des Omnissiah befolgen strikt den Katechismus von Betrieb und Wartung. Die Malateks sind ihres Amtes enthobene Priester und ähnliche Verstoßene, die auf der Jagd nach verpöntem Wissen durch die Koronus-Ausdehnung irren und dabei immer am Rande des Schisma wandeln. Ein Beschützer, der ihnen Zuflucht, Sicherheit und Ressourcen für ihre Forschungen gibt, verdient sich gewiss ihren Dank. Die Kasballica-Mission hat Verbindungen zu den Malateks und kann auf Janus heimlich einen ganzen Zirkel der unheiligen Weisen versammeln, damit sie unerschrocken die mysteriösen Xenosartefakte studieren, von denen es auf dieser Welt nur so wimmelt.
languages.original_text: Not all servants of the Omnissiah firmly adhere to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation. The malateks are defrocked clergy and other similar outcasts who wander the Koronus Expanse in pursuit of undesirable knowledge, teetering on the brink of a schism. A protector who gives them shelter, safety, and resources for their research will earn their gratitude. The Kasballica Mission has connections among the malateks and can secretly assemble an entire coven of the unholy sages on Janus so they may intrepidly study the mysterious xenos artefacts found in abundance on this world.

languages.text: Hermesih'in hizmetkârları arasında Bakım ve Faaliyet İlmihâli'ne sıkıca uymayanlar da bulunuyor. Teküfranlar, men edilmiş din adamlarından ve Koronus Enginliği'nde sakıncalı bilgiler arayan diğer benzer yurtsuzlardan oluşmaktadır. Bölünmeye kapılmanın eşiğindeki bu kimseler, kendilerine sığınak, güvenlik ve araştırmaları için lazım olan kaynakları sağlayacak olan kişiye minnet duyacaktır. Kasballica Misyonu'nun Teküfranlar arasında tanıdıkları vardır; yani Janus'ta bu melun âlimlerden tam teşekküllü bir meclis kurup dünyada bolca bulunan gizemli zeno eserlerini çekinmeden araştırmalarını sağlayabilirler.
languages.original_text: Not all servants of the Omnissiah firmly adhere to the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation. The malateks are defrocked clergy and other similar outcasts who wander the Koronus Expanse in pursuit of undesirable knowledge, teetering on the brink of a schism. A protector who gives them shelter, safety, and resources for their research will earn their gratitude. The Kasballica Mission has connections among the malateks and can secretly assemble an entire coven of the unholy sages on Janus so they may intrepidly study the mysterious xenos artefacts found in abundance on this world.
